title: Today Is a Fun....
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>So these are the dolls for the doll festival Emma was talking about, huh? It’s so lively with so many of them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Doll festival? ....Ah, you mean Hinamatsuri. Yeah, these are called Hina dolls.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu has seen them in pictures before, but never in person! Your family put this together to pray for your health, right, Riko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, that’s right~. Have you been reading about Hinamatsuri, Lanzhu-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah! After all, it’s a festival with you, so Lanzhu wanted to do something! Because of that, Lanzhu made some chirashi sushi. Look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Uwaaah! There is so much meat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>....Is that bad? The recipe Lanzhu found didn’t have any meat.... But Lanzhu figured you would be happier with some meat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s okay, I also love meat, so I’m really happy! Then, shall we get some soup to go along with it? Clam soup.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! That sounds great! Lanzhu will be cooking with you, right? Tell me anything, Lanzhu will do it for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>We’ll make everything together, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
